DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aims Over 50 % Americans overweight . These individual increase risk morbidity mortality . Weight loss 5-10 % body weight show low risk . The majority individual lose weight , without help formal program . Developing way improve weight loss individual major public health challenge . We believe Internet hold tremendous promise reach large number overweight individual assist weight loss effort . Our previous research show structured behavioral weight loss program offer via Internet , regular feedback therapist , produce average weight loss 9 lb . 6 month . The purpose project compare weight loss achieve 6 month use 3 different type Internet program , use combination SlimFast dietary component.Subject PopulationTwo hundred twenty-five overweight individual recruit , age 20-65 BMI 27-40 want lose weight use SlimFast . Participants must willing attend initial orientation weigh-in session follow-up weigh-in session agree begin second weight loss program within next 12 month . Interested participant require access computer Internet connection home workplace.Methods/DesignParticipants randomly assign one three condition : 1 ) SlimFast + Current SlimFast Website ; 2 ) SlimFast + Current SlimFast Website + Computer-Generated E-mail feedback ; 3 ) SlimFast + Current SlimFast Website + Therapist-Assisted E-mail feedback . All 3 group place calorie-restricted diet ( 1200-1500 kcal/day ) utilize SlimFast 2 meal per day healthy evening meal . They encourage increase exercise 1000 kcal/week base walking . Group 1 receive input SlimFast website . Group 2 receive weekly computer-generated feedback base diet , physical activity weight loss information . Group 3 receive weekly e-mail message train therapist provide feedback base diet , physical activity weight loss information.Data AnalysisAll participant weigh baseline , 3 month , 6 month document weight change experience . The primary analysis compare weight change baseline 6 month 3 condition . An intent-to-treat analysis use , dropout consider regain back baseline weight . Secondary analysis examine baseline predictor weight loss association use various Internet component outcome .
